client_id.description: Client id of the new virtual-money account

email.description: Email of the new virtual-money account

oauth_token.description: Oauth token for the client's login session (so that the user may be logged in immediately)

utm_source.description: Optional field to identify the source of traffic such as: search engine, newsletter, or other referral

utm_medium.description: Optional field to identify the medium the link was used upon such as: email, CPC, or other methods of sharing

utm_campaign.description: Optional field to identify a specific product promotion or strategic campaign such as a spring sale or other promotions

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
